sentences: Hänellä on hyvä tavu puhua julkisesti.
Musiikissa tavu voi olla rytminen elementti.
context: In Finnish, 'tavu' primarily refers to a syllable in language. It can also mean beat or rhythm in musical contexts. A syllable is a unit of pronunciation that typically contains a vowel sound and may be surrounded by consonants. In music, a beat represents the basic unit of time and rhythm.
